languages.text: "В-вольный Торговец! Какая честь говорить с вами лично. Смерть Мастера Печатей — страшная, ужасная трагедия! Впрочем я уверен, у вас были на то причины. Меня же отправили доложить, что новый Мастер займет свой пост через несколько лун, когда префекты соберут совет и выберут достойного кандидата. До тех пор прием новых заявок временно остановлен. Однако спешу вас обрадовать — на работу заверителей сей инцидент не повлияет ни в коем разе! Скорее, занимайте свое место в очереди — и да пребудет с вами воля Его!"

traits.locale_text: "В-вольный Торговец! Какая честь говорить с вами лично. Смерть Мастера Печатей — страшная, ужасная трагедия! Впрочем я уверен, у вас были на то причины. Меня же отправили доложить, что новый Мастер займет свой пост через несколько лун, когда префекты соберут совет и выберут достойного кандидата. До тех пор прием новых заявок временно остановлен. Однако спешу вас обрадовать — на работу заверителей сей инцидент не повлияет ни в коем разе! Скорее, занимайте свое место в очереди — и да пребудет с вами воля Его!"
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

languages.text: “行、行商浪人！能与您当面交谈，是多么令人荣幸的事情啊。印章大师的死是个可怕的悲剧！但我相信您之所以这么做，一定有您充分的理由。我向您报告，等行政官召开会议，选出另一位有价值的候选人之后，新任印章大师就会在几个月内上任了。在那之前，我们不会再接受任何新的请愿了。不过，我可以向您保证，这起事故对认证官目前的工作没有任何影响！因此，请您等在队伍里吧，愿帝皇的意志与您同在！”
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

traits.locale_text: “行、行商浪人！能与您当面交谈，是多么令人荣幸的事情啊。印章大师的死是个可怕的悲剧！但我相信您之所以这么做，一定有您充分的理由。我向您报告，等行政官召开会议，选出另一位有价值的候选人之后，新任印章大师就会在几个月内上任了。在那之前，我们不会再接受任何新的请愿了。不过，我可以向您保证，这起事故对认证官目前的工作没有任何影响！因此，请您等在队伍里吧，愿帝皇的意志与您同在！”
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Co... ¡Comerciante Independiente! Es un honor hablar con usted en persona. ¡La muerte de la Maestra de Sellos es una tragedia! Pero sé que debió de tener sus razones. Me han enviado para informarle de habrá un nuevo maestro de sellos dentro de varias lunas, cuando el consejo de prefectos se reúna y elija a un candidato digno. Hasta entonces, no se aceptarán más solicitudes. Pero permítame asegurarle que el incidente no afecta al trabajo de nuestros oficiales de certificación. ¡Así que ocupe su lugar en la cola y que el Emperador {mf|le|la} proteja!»
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

Me han enviado para informarle de habrá un nuevo maestro de sellos dentro de varias lunas, cuando el consejo de prefectos se reúna y elija a un candidato digno. Pero permítame asegurarle que el incidente no afecta al trabajo de nuestros oficiales de certificación. ¡Así que ocupe su lugar en la cola y que el Emperador {mf|le|la} proteja!»
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「じ、自由開拓者！直接お話しできるとは光栄です。印章長が亡くなるとはなんと恐ろしい惨事でしょう！ですが、陛下なりの理由があってのことでしょう。総監協議会を開いてふさわしい候補者を選出してから新しい印章長が就任するまで、数ヶ月を要するとの報告を受けました。それまで新しい申請は承れません。しかしながら、取り急ぎお伝えしたいのは、この事件は我々証明役の業務には何ら影響ないという点です！ですから、陛下の順番をお待ちください。どうか主のご加護がありますよう！」
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

traits.locale_text: 「じ、自由開拓者！直接お話しできるとは光栄です。印章長が亡くなるとはなんと恐ろしい惨事でしょう！ですが、陛下なりの理由があってのことでしょう。総監協議会を開いてふさわしい候補者を選出してから新しい印章長が就任するまで、数ヶ月を要するとの報告を受けました。それまで新しい申請は承れません。しかしながら、取り急ぎお伝えしたいのは、この事件は我々証明役の業務には何ら影響ないという点です！ですから、陛下の順番をお待ちください。どうか主のご加護がありますよう！」
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: « L-{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! C'est un honneur de vous parler en personne. La mort de la maîtresse des sceaux est une affreuse tragédie, mais je suis sûr que vous aviez vos raisons pour en arriver là. On m'informe que son remplaçant ne prendra pas ses fonctions avant plusieurs lunes, le temps que le conseil des préfets se réunisse et sélectionne un candidat qualifié. En attendant, nous n'acceptons plus de nouveaux dossiers. Mais je vous rassure tout de suite, cet incident n'a aucun impact sur le travail de nos agents de certification ! Prenez donc place dans la queue, et puisse Sa volonté vous sourire ! »
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

traits.locale_text: « L-{mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! C'est un honneur de vous parler en personne. Prenez donc place dans la queue, et puisse Sa volonté vous sourire ! »
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "{mf|F-Freihändler|F-Freihändlerin}! Was für eine Ehre, persönlich mit Euch zu sprechen. Der Tod der Meisterin der Siegel ist eine fürchterliche und erschreckende Tragödie! Aber Ihr hattet bestimmt Eure Gründe. Ich soll melden, dass ein neuer Meister der Siegel innerhalb einiger Monde den Posten besetzen wird, sobald der Rat der Präfekten getagt und einen würdigen Kandidaten erwählt hat. Bis dahin werden keine neuen Anträge angenommen. Aber seid versichert – der Vorfall hat keine Auswirkungen auf die Arbeit unserer Zertifizierungsoffiziere! Bitte stellt Euch in die Warteschlange – und möge Sein Wille mit Euch sein!"
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

Bitte stellt Euch in die Warteschlange – und möge Sein Wille mit Euch sein!"
traits.speaker: NewMasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Hü... Hür Tacir! Sizinle bizzat konuşmak çok büyük bir şeref. Mühür Üstadı'nın ölümü, berbat ve korkunç bir trajedi! Gerçi eminim bunun için haklı sebepleriniz vardı. Birkaç ay içinde prefekt konseyi toplanıp liyakatli bir aday seçtikten sonra, eskisinin yerine yeni bir Mühür Üstadı'nın geçeceğini bildirmem için gönderildim. O zamana kadar yeni başvuru kabul edilmeyecek. Ancak size hızlıca belirtmek isterim ki bu hadise, tasdikname görevlilerimizin çıkardığı işi hiç etkilememiştir! O yüzden lütfen kuyrukta yerinizi alın... O'nun rızası üstünüzde olsun!"
languages.original_text: "R-Rogue Trader! What an honour it is to speak to you in person. The death of the Master of Seals is a terrible and frightening tragedy! But I am sure you had your reasons. I have been sent to report that a new Master of Seals will take up their post within several moons, once the prefect council has convened and selected a worthy candidate. Until then, no new applications will be accepted. But I hasten to assure you — this incident has had no impact on the work of our certification officers! So, please take your place in the queue — and may His will be upon you!"

O yüzden lütfen kuyrukta yerinizi alın... O'nun rızası üstünüzde olsun!"
